00011 /**
00012  * methods to compress css and javascript
00013  *
00014  * @author mnt@codeninja.de
00015  * @package kata
00016  */
00017 class MinifyUtility {
00018 
00019              public function js($js) {
00020                           return JSMin::minify($js);
00021              }
00022 
00023              public function css($css) {
00024                           $css = preg_replace_callback("/url\s*\((.*)\)/siU", array (
00025                                        $this,
00026                                        "base64Url"
00027                           ), $css);
00028 
00029                           $css = preg_replace("/\/\*[\d\D]*?\*\/|\t+/", " ", $css);
00030                           $css = str_replace(array (
00031                                        "\n",
00032                                        "\r",
00033                                        "\t"
00034                           ), " ", $css);
00035                           $css = preg_replace("/\s\s+/", " ", $css);
00036                           $css = preg_replace("/\s*({|}|\[|\]|=|~|\+|>|\||;|:|,)\s*/", "$1", $css);
00037                           $css = trim($css);
00038 
00039                           $css = preg_replace_callback("/url\s*\((.*)\)/siU", array (
00040                                        $this,
00041                                        "debase64Url"
00042                           ), $css);
00043 
00044                           return $css;
00045              }
00046 
00047              /**
00048               * Encodes a url() expression.
00049               *
00050               * @param    array        $match
00051               * @return   string
00052               */
00053              private function base64Url($match) {
00054                           return "url(" . base64_encode(trim($match[1])) . ")";
00055              }
00056              /**
00057               * Decodes a url() expression.
00058               *
00059               * @param    array        $match
00060               * @return   string
00061               */
00062              private function debase64Url($match) {
00063                           return "url(" . base64_decode($match[1]) . ")";
00064              }
00065 
00066 }

00071 /**
00072  * jsmin.php - PHP implementation of Douglas Crockford's JSMin.
00073  *
00074  * This is pretty much a direct port of jsmin.c to PHP with just a few
00075  * PHP-specific performance tweaks. Also, whereas jsmin.c reads from stdin and
00076  * outputs to stdout, this library accepts a string as input and returns another
00077  * string as output.
00078  *
00079  * PHP 5 or higher is required.
00080  *
00081  * Permission is hereby granted to use this version of the library under the
00082  * same terms as jsmin.c, which has the following license:
00083  *
00084  * --
00085  * Copyright (c) 2002 Douglas Crockford  (www.crockford.com)
00086  *
00087  * Permission is hereby granted, free of charge, to any person obtaining a copy of
00088  * this software and associated documentation files (the "Software"), to deal in
00089  * the Software without restriction, including without limitation the rights to
00090  * use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute, sublicense, and/or sell copies
00091  * of the Software, and to permit persons to whom the Software is furnished to do
00092  * so, subject to the following conditions:
00093  *
00094  * The above copyright notice and this permission notice shall be included in all
00095  * copies or substantial portions of the Software.
00096  *
00097  * The Software shall be used for Good, not Evil.
00098  *
00099  * THE SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED "AS IS", WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR
00100  * IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY,
00101  * FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NONINFRINGEMENT. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE
00102  * AUTHORS OR COPYRIGHT HOLDERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR OTHER
00103  * LIABILITY, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, ARISING FROM,
00104  * OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR OTHER DEALINGS IN THE
00105  * SOFTWARE.
00106  * --
00107  *
00108  * @package JSMin
00109  * @author Ryan Grove <ryan@wonko.com>
00110  * @copyright 2002 Douglas Crockford <douglas@crockford.com> (jsmin.c)
00111  * @copyright 2008 Ryan Grove <ryan@wonko.com> (PHP port)
00112  * @license http://opensource.org/licenses/mit-license.php MIT License
00113  * @version 1.1.1 (2008-03-02)
00114  * @link http://code.google.com/p/jsmin-php/
00115  */

00117 class JSMin {
00118   const ORD_LF    = 10;
00119   const ORD_SPACE = 32;
00120 
00121   protected $a           = '';
00122   protected $b           = '';
00123   protected $input       = '';
00124   protected $inputIndex  = 0;
00125   protected $inputLength = 0;
00126   protected $lookAhead   = null;
00127   protected $output      = '';
00128 
00129   // -- Public Static Methods --------------------------------------------------
00130 
00131   public static function minify($js) {
00132     $jsmin = new JSMin($js);
00133     return $jsmin->min();
00134   }
00135 
00136   // -- Public Instance Methods ------------------------------------------------
00137 
00138   public function __construct($input) {
00139     $this->input       = str_replace("\r\n", "\n", $input);
00140     $this->inputLength = strlen($this->input);
00141   }
00142 
00143   // -- Protected Instance Methods ---------------------------------------------
00144 
00145   protected function action($d) {
00146     switch($d) {
00147       case 1:
00148         $this->output .= $this->a;
00149 
00150       case 2:
00151         $this->a = $this->b;
00152 
00153         if ($this->a === "'" || $this->a === '"') {
00154           for (;;) {
00155             $this->output .= $this->a;
00156             $this->a       = $this->get();
00157 
00158             if ($this->a === $this->b) {
00159               break;
00160             }
00161 
00162             if (ord($this->a) <= self::ORD_LF) {
00163               throw new JSMinException('Unterminated string literal.');
00164             }
00165 
00166             if ($this->a === '\\') {
00167               $this->output .= $this->a;
00168               $this->a       = $this->get();
00169             }
00170           }
00171         }
00172 
00173       case 3:
00174         $this->b = $this->next();
00175 
00176         if ($this->b === '/' && (
00177             $this->a === '(' || $this->a === ',' || $this->a === '=' ||
00178             $this->a === ':' || $this->a === '[' || $this->a === '!' ||
00179             $this->a === '&' || $this->a === '|' || $this->a === '?')) {
00180 
00181           $this->output .= $this->a . $this->b;
00182 
00183           for (;;) {
00184             $this->a = $this->get();
00185 
00186             if ($this->a === '/') {
00187               break;
00188             } elseif ($this->a === '\\') {
00189               $this->output .= $this->a;
00190               $this->a       = $this->get();
00191             } elseif (ord($this->a) <= self::ORD_LF) {
00192               throw new JSMinException('Unterminated regular expression '.
00193                   'literal.');
00194             }
00195 
00196             $this->output .= $this->a;
00197           }
00198 
00199           $this->b = $this->next();
00200         }
00201     }
00202   }
00203 
00204   protected function get() {
00205     $c = $this->lookAhead;
00206     $this->lookAhead = null;
00207 
00208     if ($c === null) {
00209       if ($this->inputIndex < $this->inputLength) {
00210         $c = $this->input[$this->inputIndex];
00211         $this->inputIndex += 1;
00212       } else {
00213         $c = null;
00214       }
00215     }
00216 
00217     if ($c === "\r") {
00218       return "\n";
00219     }
00220 
00221     if ($c === null || $c === "\n" || ord($c) >= self::ORD_SPACE) {
00222       return $c;
00223     }
00224 
00225     return ' ';
00226   }
00227 
00228   protected function isAlphaNum($c) {
00229     return ord($c) > 126 || $c === '\\' || preg_match('/^[\w\$]$/', $c) === 1;
00230   }
00231 
00232   protected function min() {
00233     $this->a = "\n";
00234     $this->action(3);
00235 
00236     while ($this->a !== null) {
00237       switch ($this->a) {
00238         case ' ':
00239           if ($this->isAlphaNum($this->b)) {
00240             $this->action(1);
00241           } else {
00242             $this->action(2);
00243           }
00244           break;
00245 
00246         case "\n":
00247           switch ($this->b) {
00248             case '{':
00249             case '[':
00250             case '(':
00251             case '+':
00252             case '-':
00253               $this->action(1);
00254               break;
00255 
00256             case ' ':
00257               $this->action(3);
00258               break;
00259 
00260             default:
00261               if ($this->isAlphaNum($this->b)) {
00262                 $this->action(1);
00263               }
00264               else {
00265                 $this->action(2);
00266               }
00267           }
00268           break;
00269 
00270         default:
00271           switch ($this->b) {
00272             case ' ':
00273               if ($this->isAlphaNum($this->a)) {
00274                 $this->action(1);
00275                 break;
00276               }
00277 
00278               $this->action(3);
00279               break;
00280 
00281             case "\n":
00282               switch ($this->a) {
00283                 case '}':
00284                 case ']':
00285                 case ')':
00286                 case '+':
00287                 case '-':
00288                 case '"':
00289                 case "'":
00290                   $this->action(1);
00291                   break;
00292 
00293                 default:
00294                   if ($this->isAlphaNum($this->a)) {
00295                     $this->action(1);
00296                   }
00297                   else {
00298                     $this->action(3);
00299                   }
00300               }
00301               break;
00302 
00303             default:
00304               $this->action(1);
00305               break;
00306           }
00307       }
00308     }
00309 
00310     return $this->output;
00311   }
00312 
00313   protected function next() {
00314     $c = $this->get();
00315 
00316     if ($c === '/') {
00317       switch($this->peek()) {
00318         case '/':
00319           for (;;) {
00320             $c = $this->get();
00321 
00322             if (ord($c) <= self::ORD_LF) {
00323               return $c;
00324             }
00325           }
00326 
00327         case '*':
00328           $this->get();
00329 
00330           for (;;) {
00331             switch($this->get()) {
00332               case '*':
00333                 if ($this->peek() === '/') {
00334                   $this->get();
00335                   return ' ';
00336                 }
00337                 break;
00338 
00339               case null:
00340                 throw new JSMinException('Unterminated comment.');
00341             }
00342           }
00343 
00344         default:
00345           return $c;
00346       }
00347     }
00348 
00349     return $c;
00350   }
00351 
00352   protected function peek() {
00353     $this->lookAhead = $this->get();
00354     return $this->lookAhead;
00355   }
00356 }
00357 
00358 // -- Exceptions ---------------------------------------------------------------
00359 class JSMinException extends Exception {}
